content.text:
# Draft:1918–19 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

----
The 1918-19 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 31st season of existence and their 4th season in The London Combination, a competition made up of reserve and senior teams founded during World War I. QPR finished 5th in the league during the campaign.
Season summary
In the 1918-19 season Qpr continued play in the London Combination .
